"Somua": "Central City is at the forefront of our war with the DOLLS."
"This is a place where many ARKS gather, so don't be afraid to ask someone for help."
"Do you know of the \"Gigantix\"? The fearsome beasts that are said to appear during intense storms?"
"Would you help me collect some much-needed data to get to the bottom of these rumours?"
"Thank you very much for your cooperation!"
"As I told you before, Gigantix are extremely powerful enemies. I'm not asking you to fight them."
"All I need you to do is get close to one, confirm its appearance, and then send that visual data to me."
"That would be greatly appreciated. And please, do be careful."
"Oh, I see... If you're ever able to lend assistance, please come by again."
